CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>T</size>hick webbing surrounds you in a canopy of shadows. You light additional torches to hold the darkness at bayâ€”and not a moment too soon, for a foe stands revealed in the torchlight!
<indent=50></indent>You swing the torch reflexively, and are rewarded with a yelp of pain as the burning brand strikes.

Localization.Title: Light the Torches
Localization.Text: Upkeep: Deal 1 damage to an Enemy (limit 3 uses)
